content:
# It seems that the attempt to insert iron ore into the furnace has failed because my inventory no longer contains any iron ore.
# This is unexpected since I just harvested 10 iron ore earlier, but it appears all of it has been processed.

# Since we need more iron plates to craft the assembling machine, I will need to gather additional iron ore resources.

# I will search for the nearest iron ore resource and harvest more iron ore.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Finding the nearest iron ore resource
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Moving to the iron ore resource position
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting more iron ore

# After harvesting, I will check the inventory to see the updated resources.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the updated inventory after harvesting iron ore
